attributes.action: urge the queen to stop giving mbe/obes to sports people and celebrities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MBE/OBE/ NIGHTHOOD S ARE FOR PEOPLE WHO GIVE OUT STANDING SERVICE TO THIS COUNTRY FOR EXAMPLE THE SOLDIERS IN IRAQ AND AFGANISTAN . AIR SEA RESCUE .
tHESE FOOTBALLERS AND CELEBRITIES GET PAID A FORTUNE THEN THE QUEEN GIVES THEM A MEDAL , ITS CRAZY

rejection.details: Please re-draft without all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
